description: 10th grade student with above-grade-level ability but low engagement due to lack of perceived relevance

relevance.rule: Flag activities without clear real-world connection or relevance to student interests

severity_thresholds.high: Abstract practice with no relevance explanation; pure drill or test prep framing
severity_thresholds.medium: Some relevance mentioned but weak connection to student life or future goals
severity_thresholds.low: Relevance present but could be strengthened with more compelling context

challenge.rule: Flag tasks below grade level or lacking intellectual depth and higher-order thinking

severity_thresholds.high: No higher-order thinking required; all retrieval and basic comprehension
severity_thresholds.medium: Some analysis present but insufficient challenge; mostly routine procedures
severity_thresholds.low: Adequate challenge overall but extension opportunities missing for advanced learners

choice.rule: Flag lessons with no student input on approach, method, or product format

severity_thresholds.high: Entirely teacher-directed with single prescribed path and no options whatsoever
severity_thresholds.medium: Limited choices offered (pick A or B only); minimal autonomy
severity_thresholds.low: Some meaningful choice but more opportunities could be embedded

real_world.rule: Flag pure academic exercises with no application to authentic contexts or problems

severity_thresholds.high: Abstract skills with no context (e.g., 'analyze this because it's on the test'); disconnected from reality
severity_thresholds.medium: Weak connection to real use case; contrived or superficial application
severity_thresholds.low: Real-world connection exists but could be more compelling or current

autonomy.rule: Flag rigid pacing and structure with no flexibility in how/when students work

severity_thresholds.high: Everyone must do exact same thing at exact same time; lock-step instruction throughout
severity_thresholds.medium: Some flexibility in timing only; no choice in approach or pacing within activities
severity_thresholds.low: Pace flexibility exists but not approach flexibility; could offer more student agency
